name: Manoe's Quest
description:
Made by @mahjoub_gamedev in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 49 

Description

As a hero of your village, your quest is to reconnect energy orbs to their proper place in order to bring back people's hopes..
You will need to use your strength to  create your own path in this unstable world.

Gameplay

The gameplay is divided in 2 phases:
1 - Platformer phase where you can push platforms in order to rotate them and more..
2 - Shoot orbs and try to connect them with empty slots.

Bonus rewards are completely optional, they are just here in order to add a bit more challenge 

Commands

SPACE: Action depending of the current phase of the gameplay.
Arrows Keys: Movements
R: Restart current level

Music

Main Theme available on SoundCloud
